column4: went for a wlak with my girlfriend in the forest, it just snowed last night
sorry had an old thing in clipboard
did you configure your browser to use it?
(be sure to read the docs in /usr/share/doc/privoxy and tor)
i followed a few tutorials. perhaps i need those ports open on ym rounter? but the internet still works it just shows my IP everywhere not a different ont
well, did you configure your browser to use them?
no, i used the torbutton firefox extension which should do that automatically. but before i tried confing firefox manually also and nothing
if still nothing i'll come back, thank you for the suggestions and help though
I believe that's affected by locales settings
perhaps sudo dpkg-reconfigure locales, but I'm not positive
also, check your System -> Administration -> Language Support
